abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 320 damage in an area. Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 120 damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 200 damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 second. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

heroics.name: Phoenix
heroics.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 damage and splashing for 50%.

heroics.name: Pyroblast
heroics.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 damage to an enemy Hero and 405 damage to enemies nearby.
